title.text: TEXTUAL EXPERTISE IN WORD EXPERTS: AN APPROACH TO TEXT PARSING BASED ON TOPIC/COMMENT MONITORING *

abstractContent.text: In this paper prototype versions of two word experts for text analysis are dealt with which demonstrate that word experts area feasible tool for parsing texts on the level of text cohesion as well as text coherence.
The analysis is based on two major knowledge sources: context information is modelled in terms of a frame knowledge base, while the co-text keeps record of the linear sequencing of text analysis.
